title: My league client bugsplatting loop
body: So i know a lot of people are having this issue but i turned off my discord overlay and it still doesn't work please help {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: There could be a permissions issue going on as well that's not responding to the patcher properly.  Try running as Admin or the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  Let me know if that does the trick for you.
